title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS EXERCISES ON DR. MARCO PARET'S MASTERCLASS
description:
These images come from Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. His students are practicing the powerful hypnosis techniques that they learned. They are doing magnetic passes, achieving hypnotic inductions, catalepsy and more. Dr. Paret's Masterclasses are international and available in several languages. If you are interested in non-verbal hypnosis, if you want to better your work with clients or you just want self improvement, learn from the best teacher, participate in our non-verbal hypnosis school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
